text: Anatole Novak (12 February 1937 – 5 January 2022) was a French professional road bicycle racer. He was born in La Mure, France. Novak participated at the Tour de France in 1961 and 1964. Novak died on 5 January 2022 at the age of 84.Cyclisme : l'Isérois Anatole Novak est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Tour de France results for Anatole Novak Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:People from Isère Category:Sportspeople from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
title: Anatole Novak
